author: misilva73
content: Agree with <@543900561460822016> that is should be charged `COLD_ACCOUNT_COST_CODE`. <@316280621783580673> , should we add this type of the transaction to the EIP?

author: misilva73
content: <@830368514225340436> , Ben was also working on the specs for EIP-2780. Would it make sense to colaborate to avoid duplicated work?

author: gurukamath
content: Absolutely. Here is where I am right now. Almost, have the `execution-specs` implementation and some basic tests ready to go. Am expecting to raise the PR sometime today with some more tests

content: This is great! Happy to review it when you have it.
